description: A 31-year-old man and 14-year-old boy remain in custody after the missing girl was found.
title: Two arrested on suspicion of kidnapping girl
title_page: Two arrested on suspicion of kidnapping girl in Crewe - BBC News
maintext:
A man and teenage boy have been arrested on suspicion of kidnap after a girl went missing.
Police were called following reports of a girl leaving in an unknown vehicle on Edleston Road in Crewe, Cheshire, at about 14:30 GMT on Tuesday.
Officers notified neighbouring forces and the vehicle was found in Derbyshire, Cheshire Police said.
The girl was reported to have been found safe and well inside it, a force spokesperson added.
